SRP.Q: In 1982, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Seasonal Goods relative to Beauty Products?
SRP.A: In 1982, Seasonal Goods is {below} Beauty Products in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Seasonal Goods, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1983 relative to that in 1976 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Seasonal Goods, the data point in 1983 is {below} and to the {right} of the data point in 1976.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Furniture Sellers. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(3 points need to be provided)
